programme.title: Ciye Ciye Yang Udah Move On
programme.desc: At the reunion, Rania is shocked to see Alex dating Una, a goat herder. Rania will strain Alex and Una's relationship. Rio helps his mother find goats at the market. Will Rio and Una ever get closer?

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 35
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Suka Ngeri Kalo Inget Jagoan Di Hati
programme.desc: Suka Ngeri Kalau Ingat Jagoan di Hati (Sungai Ngeri If Remember the Hero in Your Heart) tells the story of a young couple named Lisa (Ika Dihardjo) and Yoga (Hardi Fadhillah). Both come from humble backgrounds. It turns out that Yoga is infatuated with a beautiful girl named Dita, and Lisa is infatuated with a handsome man, who even makes Yoga jealous repeatedly.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 489

programme.title: Arjuna Cintanya Gak Pernah Berchandya
programme.desc: Ayu (Nabila Zavira) already has a boyfriend, but her father, who loves Javanese puppetry, doesn't like her boyfriend. Then, Ayu meets a handsome young man wearing an Anoman costume, but Ayu thinks he's playing a trick on her. It turns out that while she's undergoing training for a teacher promotion, Ayu meets the young man who loves Javanese art again, and their suitcases even get swapped.

programme.desc: Leyla (Nadya Arina), a young and beautiful widow. She is having a dark time in her marriage, she has a boyfriend named Dion (Naufal Samudra). They have been dating for a year, Dion is ready to propose and marry Leyla. But Leyla is not ready to marry again, because she is still traumatized by marriage. One day, Leyla meets Bima (Kano Weidner), her ex-husband, Bima explains that he left her because he is looking for work abroad.

programme.title: Tak Kot - EP 11
programme.desc: Saksikan selebriti popular tanah air bercuti sambil dicabar menangani fobia yang terdapat dalam diri mereka. Berjayakah mereka menyelesaikan misi?

programme.title: Ini Malam Kita Punya - EP 7
programme.desc: Rancangan bual bicara yang akan di hoskan oleh Nabil Ahmad yang akan mengetengahkan sketch lawak dan temu bual bersama artis-artis terkenal Malaysia

programme.title: Pok Ya Cong Codei Memburu Siti - EP 15
programme.desc: Selepas ditinggalkan Siti, Pok Ya tidak berhasrat untuk mencarinya sehinggalah mendapat tahu Siti sedang mengandungkan anaknya. Misi menjejaki Siti semakin tegang setelah mengetahui dia sebenarnya diculik!

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 51
programme.desc: Eyra and Zayn merayu kepada Adellia supaya tidak membuat laporan polis. Eyra baru sedar yang Rasyid adalah seorang penipu. Zayn terdengar perbualan Dr Farhan yang ada kaitan dengan dirinya.

programme.title: Naluri Hati - EP 8
programme.desc: Pada hari perkahwinannya, Dinda teragak-agak kerana dia akan berkahwin dengan orang yang tidak dicintainya. Namun, satu kejadian berlaku dan menyebabkan Dinda mengalami amnesia separa.

programme.title: RASA Anak Emak Anak Bapak - EP 5
programme.desc: Majalah masakan di Malaysia kini di kaca televisyen anda memaparkan resepi - resepi menarik setiap minggu yang dihoskan oleh Norzaini Abdul Halim (Aunty Aini) bersama - sama Adam Mahamed Ismail.

programme.title: Tolonglah, Cik B! - EP 4
programme.desc: Cik B diberi ‘lesen’ untuk meninggalkan rumahnya bersama seorang rakan hos, dan mereka bersama akan meneroka aktiviti hobi & sukan baru dan menarik sambil kita mengenali Cik B dengan lebih mendalam.

programme.title: Pengantin Lelaki Untuk Cik Gadis - EP 10
programme.desc: Kecewa dengan impian untuk bergelar tentera, Kris al-Hadi ke ladang Tok Abah. Pertemuan dengan Salsabila, gadis malang yang difitnah hingga terpenjara telah menimbulkan rasa simpati dan cinta.

programme.title: Sesat - EP 1
programme.desc: Sesat, rancangan yang menguji minda dan ikhtiar hidup selebriti tempatan dalam mencari destinasi yang ditetapkan.

programme.title: Kampung Pom Pom Letops - EP 6
programme.desc: Elly Mazlein atau dikenali sebagai Kak Lina Pom Pom menjemput tetamu jemputan yang terdiri daripada duda dan jejaka idaman Malaya.

programme.title: Keluarga Iskandar - EP 9
programme.desc: Seorang ibu yang tegas dan penyayang bernama Mak Jah yang berusaha sedapa upaya untuk menyatukan anak-anak, menantu dan cucu-cucunya yang dilanda perpecahan.

programme.title: Jejaka Terhangat Di Pasaran

programme.title: En Tongs Au Pied De L'himalaya
programme.desc: Andrea, aged 6, has an autism spectrum disorder. He is starting the final year of kindergarten, a crucial year that will determine whether he can stay in school. For Pauline, his mother, the stakes are high. Especially as, recently separated and with no fixed income, she is struggling to find her own stability.

programme.title: Trajet De Nuit
programme.desc: Paris, 3 a.m. A young rideshare driver picks up his passenger. The conversation begins, the routine breaks, but the ride will turn into a confrontation.

programme.title: Les Petits Monstres
programme.desc: Erwan, who is visually impaired, can't wait to get to school to declare his love for Agathe. Every day, he shares a school transport van with David, who is in a wheelchair. But this morning, tensions are running high between the two teenagers.

programme.title: File D'attente - EP 5
programme.desc: Eleonore and Manon visit a nail salon. Francesca has a malaise during an activity with Raymond and the latter makes her to go and see a doctor. Jean-Baptiste returns from his trip.

programme.title: File D'attente - EP 6
programme.desc: Napoleon is worried about eleonore. Laurie-Lou accompanies her grandmother on an outing. Paul and Louis talk for the first time since Sacha's birth.

programme.title: File D'attente - EP 7
programme.desc: Eleonore attends a meeting for bereaved parents in the hope of finding comfort. Louis and his sisters visit care homes to find somewhere for Margot.

programme.title: Carbone - EP 9
programme.desc: We are all worried about the climate, but we're still not doing enough to solve the problem. Is our psychology acting as a brake on climate action?

programme.title: Maghreb-Orient Express - EP 9
programme.desc: What's new in the Arab worlds? Journalist Mohamed Kaci hosts those making the cultural headlines in Tunis, Algiers, Rabat, Beirut, Alexandria, Dubai...

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ? - EP 32
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut
programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhone-Alpes region.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison ! - EP 12
programme.desc: Visit to a former restaurant turned into a home. Then Viola invites us to discover a very original house: a magnificently decorated troglodyte villa.

programme.title: Curieux Begin - EP 3
programme.desc: The world of beer, for the pleasure of taste! With actor Hubert Proulx, beer expert Simon Gaudreault, pastry chef Remy Couture, and chef Guillaume Aucoin, beer is integrated into various recipes.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 27
programme.desc: French creativity is booming in the fields of fashion, crafts, design, beauty and gastronomy. 'Tendance XXI' showcases a know-how that evolves in tune with the times, sometimes even anticipating them.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Champions D'exception - EP 7
programme.desc: Contents: Portrait of Heloise Courvoisier, para triathlete; meeting with French para athletes at Charlety Stadium.

programme.title: Curieux Begin - EP 3
programme.desc: The world of beer, for the pleasure of taste! With actor Hubert Proulx, beer expert Simon Gaudreault, pastry chef Remy Couture, and chef Guillaume Aucoin, beer is integrated into various recipes.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison ! - EP 12
programme.desc: Visit to a former restaurant turned into a home. Then Viola invites us to discover a very original house: a magnificently decorated troglodyte villa.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut
programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhone-Alpes region.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 14
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 17
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 30
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 47
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 7
programme.desc: The hermit explains to Pokou and Akuba that Kakou has been attacked by supernatural powers. His soul and his spirit have been scattered through a parallel world. To save the prince, they will have to travel there themselves.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 8
programme.desc: As the rival prince's soldiers attack them, Pokou realises that they also have supernatural powers. Her aunt is kidnapped. Thanks to Boni, Pokou manages to get away and continue her quest.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France - EP 2
programme.desc: In Guiana, carnival time is the highlight of the year. Between the masked balls and the parades that fill the streets of Cayenne, everyone has their own part to play in two months of constant festivity.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Le Point - EP 10
programme.desc: Magazine programme which explores issues relating to society, science and the environment, involving investigations and in-depth analysis, from a resolutely Canadian perspective.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: La Reine Soleil
programme.desc: Ancient Egypt, 18th dynasty. The fiery Princess Akhesa, 14, rebels against her father, Pharaoh Akhenaten. She refuses to live confined within the walls of the royal palace and runs away with the help of Prince Tut to find her mother, Queen Nefertiti, who has been exiled on Elephantine Island...

programme.title: L'americain
programme.desc: To stave off boredom and make himself the centre of attention, Malik tells three local youngsters that he's leaving to live in the USA. It isn't true, but once the news has spread around the neighbourhood, he becomes a symbol of hope and pride for everyone.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 9
programme.desc: We're off to the Musee des Beaux-Arts in Tours! In the heart of Paris, mosaic artist Luigi La Ferla builds and deconstructs his works. With Mame Kurogouchi, shape is sculpted from the body itself. Painter Camille Viry brings her landscapes to life using traditional decorative painting techniques.

programme.title: Jeux D'influence - EP 1
programme.desc: Villeneuve, a farmer, has been diagnosed with leukaemia, an illness apparently linked to his use of a herbicide manufactured by the multinational company Saskia. Childhood friend and MP, Delpierre, launches a campaign to have the product banned. Then Saskia's marketing director is found dead, drowned in the Seine.

programme.title: Jeux D'influence - EP 2
programme.desc: Forrest's body has been found in the Seine. Bowman is tasked with convincing his family that he committed suicide, but the deceased's daughter, Chloe, refutes the claim and decides to investigate his death herself. Meanwhile Villeneuve wants to take Saskia to court, against the advice of those around him.

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France - EP 1
programme.desc: Each carnival season in French Guiana sees the return of the mysterious touloulous, haunting the masked balls in search of a dance partner. A tradition with unique and very strict rules. But carnival also means music, and the band Les Mecenes has been setting the tempo for forty years.

programme.title: Un Alibi
programme.desc: Maude, Pierre and Tom, friends of longstanding, meet up for a birthday party at Max and Lucie's. When they arrive they find Max kneeling beside Lucie's body. His guilt seems obvious. His friends, convinced he's innocent, decide to give him an alibi. But will the group withstand the police investigation?

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.desc: We're off to the Musee des Beaux-Arts in Tours! In the heart of Paris, mosaic artist Luigi La Ferla builds and deconstructs his works. With Mame Kurogouchi, shape is sculpted from the body itself. Painter Camille Viry brings her landscapes to life using traditional decorative painting techniques.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut
programme.desc: A magazine programme devoted to the mountains. An opportunity to explore a rich and fascinating world and take a sumptuous journey through the heart of the most beautiful landscapes of the Auvergne-Rhone-Alpes region.

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Merci Professeur !
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.title: L'actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: 64' Debat
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What it's all about: the guests take an in-depth look at a key issue. Increased focus on Francophone cultural news, with dedicated sequences. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: C'est Du Belge
programme.desc: Gerald Watelet shines the spotlight on the people putting Belgium on the map. Expect reports on the best culture and heritage ambassadors, behind-the-scenes glimpses of elite events and profiles of those making headlines.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Louis Et La Faune Urbaine - EP 11
programme.desc: Louis and Travis get to work with some particularly aggressive racoons. Travis then has to learn how to negotiate with wasps.

programme.title: C'est Succulent ! - EP 7
programme.desc: Leila Albert opens her kitchen doors to Erick Leleux, a tireless shopkeeper and passionate caterer from the Hauts-de-France region. Based in Maroilles, he puts this emblematic northern cheese to the test and concocts his own recipe for Maroilles tart, along with a variation with vegetables.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 9
programme.desc: We're off to the Musee des Beaux-Arts in Tours! In the heart of Paris, mosaic artist Luigi La Ferla builds and deconstructs his works. With Mame Kurogouchi, shape is sculpted from the body itself. Painter Camille Viry brings her landscapes to life using traditional decorative painting techniques.

programme.title: Les Mots De La Paix
programme.desc: Crises, coups, wars, transnational threats, outside interference, global warming: the stability of Africa and the safety of the civil populations are in danger. Via twenty words, the political scientist Niagale Bagayoko analyses the current security challenges and dynamics.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Champions D'exception - EP 8
programme.desc: Contents: Portrait of Martin Barron, blind football champion; discovery of a karting circuit offering promising accessibility to motorsports.

programme.title: C'est Succulent ! - EP 7
programme.desc: Leila Albert opens her kitchen doors to Erick Leleux, a tireless shopkeeper and passionate caterer from the Hauts-de-France region. Based in Maroilles, he puts this emblematic northern cheese to the test and concocts his own recipe for Maroilles tart, along with a variation with vegetables.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Louis Et La Faune Urbaine - EP 11
programme.desc: Louis and Travis get to work with some particularly aggressive racoons. Travis then has to learn how to negotiate with wasps.

programme.title: C'est Du Belge
programme.desc: Gerald Watelet shines the spotlight on the people putting Belgium on the map. Expect reports on the best culture and heritage ambassadors, behind-the-scenes glimpses of elite events and profiles of those making headlines.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 15
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 18
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 31
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi - EP 48
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 9
programme.desc: Boni and Pokou return to seek shelter with the old hermit who possesses an object that will be essential to them if they want to travel through the portal to the parallel world.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou - EP 10
programme.desc: Boni and Pokou enter the magical world. In a farming village they meet Akissi, a little girl who asks them to play a game with her.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Bien Vivre En France - EP 3
programme.desc: Welcome aboard the ''Marcel Angie III''! For Stephane, one of Saint Pierre's last-remaining fishermen, it's the height of the snow crab season. More than a passion, his profession is a veritable way of life.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Temps Present
programme.desc: 'Temps Present'' tackles current events broadly speaking. With its in-depth investigations and critical vision, the programme sheds light on the crises and the conflicts of our time, while denouncing the malfunctions of our society.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes - EP 3
programme.desc: In 2025, Rome will host the Vatican Jubilee, an important event for Catholics worldwide that takes place every twenty-five years. More than 32 million visitors are expected in the Italian capital, which takes the opportunity to restore and highlight its architectural and cultural treasures.

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 11
programme.desc: A picture postcard of the Gascony countryside, the Gers, with its vineyards and verdant landscapes, is a ''big garden'', rich in agriculture and livestock. The birthplace of d'Artagnan and Armagnac, Gascon traditions and cuisine live on in this land of history and culture.

programme.title: Movie - Kutti Puli
programme.desc: Kutti Puli is a happy go-lucky, good-hearted ruffian whose mother wants him to settle down. Our hero does not believe in love or marriage till he meets Bharathy. But his enemies will not allow him to lead a respectful family life.

programme.title: Movie - Saval
programme.desc: Brothers Shankar and Raja decide to go to the city for better opportunities post their mother's death. However, they get separated while travelling on a goods train.

programme.title: Movie - Adada Enna Azhagu
programme.desc: A young man falls in love with the daughter of a prominent politician. However, things take a turn when her father disapproves of their relationship and she gets kidnapped by thugs.

programme.title: Movie - Aarumaname
programme.desc: When Moorthy, a government officer, dies under mysterious circumstances, his brother Vaithi struggles to unravel the truth behind Moorthy's murder.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Super Kudumbam
programme.desc: Arun pretends to be married in order to get a house for rent. He picks Shanthi, an uncouth slum girl, to act as his wife. Eventually, circumstances change and they get actually married.

programme.title: Movie - Manaivi Solle Manthiram
programme.desc: Selvi, who is married to Dr Thyagu, is shocked by the lavish nature of his family and warns him against overspending. Enraged by their actions, Selvi decides to teach them a lesson.

programme.title: Movie - Jore
programme.desc: A righteous young man takes it upon himself the task of putting straight a powerful but corrupt politician in a village, who also happens to be the father of his love interest.

programme.title: Movie - Oorkaavalan
programme.desc: Despite protests, Kangeyan helps his brother marry a girl who is engaged to another man. But his brother is soon killed. Trouble ensues when Kangeyan decides to get his brother's widow re-married.

programme.title: Movie - Maayandi Kudumbatthar
programme.desc: The children of two brothers are at odds over a property dispute. The older brother dotes on his youngest son, but once the old man dies, the once-united family starts to disintegrate.

programme.title: Movie - Pattiyal
programme.desc: Best friends Kosi and Selvam are contract killers who are given targets by Sami. They fall in love, but their profession becomes a hurdle and the two cannot lead normal lives.

programme.title: Movie - Koil Yanai
programme.desc: Raja and Kaveri are childhood friends who fall in love with each other. Kaveri's mother wants her to get married to her uncle, but the temple elephant helps the lovers unite.

programme.title: Movie - Putham Pudhu Payanam
programme.desc: Three people who have blood cancer meet another rich guy with the same condition at a hospital. They all have only a few months to live. Over time, they become friends, leave hospital, and go to a village which is being terrorized.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Moive - Sonnalthan Kaadhala
programme.desc: Roja works at a finance company, and her colleague Murali is madly in love with her. However, Roja rejects his proposal as she is the sole breadwinner of her big family.

programme.title: Movie - Aduthathu Albert
programme.desc: Although Albert, a Christian boy, and Radha, a Brahmin girl, hate each other, they decide to help their respective sister and brother who are in love.

programme.title: Movie - Santhithavelai
programme.desc: On a trip, Aadalarasu meets his lookalike and promises to fulfill the latter's request. His lookalike dies and he takes his place in his family, while his own family thinks he is dead.

programme.title: Movie - Naan Sivappu Manithan
programme.desc: Vijay, a Tamil professor, is in love with Uma, a lawyer. Along with Ravi, he fights to put an end to prostitution and the production of illicit liquor in their locality.

programme.title: Movie - Vennila Kabadi Kuzhu
programme.desc: Having never won a tournament, a team of kabaddi players are ridiculed by their villagers. Their redemption finally arrives while playing in Madurai, for which they pay a heavy price.

programme.title: Halo World Snooker C'ship 2025 Day 13: SF1 (Ronnie O'Sullivan vs Zhao Xintong)
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.title: ASO Miscellaneous Programming 2025
programme.desc: The One Water Race is a professional race and created for the absolute best endurance racers in the world. The race distance is about 250 km, a distance of 6 marathons, split up into approximately 200 km running and 50 km swimming. Running takes place on all types of terrain, rocks, cliffs, gravel roads, paths but mostly unpaved and difficult terrain. Swimming is in open sea and can often feature strong winds, currents and waves.

programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Sunderland AFC; a club defined by its dramatic highs and painful lows. programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 9
programme.desc: Newcastle United are a team on the rise under Eddie Howe; a manager quietly rewriting the modern history of the club. With exclusive access and interviews from inside St. James' Park, we uncover the transformation Howe has led, from stabilising the team to delivering silverware and reigniting belief on Tyneside. As the Magpies set their sights on even greater heights, we ask just how far he can take this ambitious, resurgent club.

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Arsenal (MW15) - EP 141
programme.desc: Since their return to the competition in 2019, Aston Villa have won five of their 12 Premier League games against Arsenal (D1 L6), as many as they had in their previous 45 against the Gunners before relegation (D14 L26).

programme.title: Manchester City vs Sunderland (MW15) - EP 144
programme.desc: Sunderland have never won away in 13 attempts against Manchester City in the Premier League (D2 L11). Their last away top-flight win there was in December 1981 at Maine Road.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Manchester United (MW15) (Live) - EP 150
programme.desc: Wolves did the Premier League double over Manchester United last season, as many victories as they’d managed in their previous 14 against the Red Devils (W2 D3 L9).

programme.title: Aston Villa vs Arsenal (MW15) - EP 141
programme.desc: Since their return to the competition in 2019, Aston Villa have won five of their 12 Premier League games against Arsenal (D1 L6), as many as they had in their previous 45 against the Gunners before relegation (D14 L26).

programme.title: Manchester City vs Sunderland (MW15) - EP 144

programme.title: FS MMA Trevor Prangley vs. Falaniko Vitale
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! AKA product Trevor Prangley takes on Falaniko "Niko" Vitale in a middleweight fight. The South African Prangley looks to take out the Hawaiin native Vitale in the tournament sime-final matchup in sunny San Jose, CA, USA.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Ola Afolabi I
programme.desc: We look back to the beginning of the historic years-long rivalry between Marco Huck and Ola Afolabi, which began in Ludwigsburg, Germany with Huck putting his WBO Cruiserweight World Championship on the line for the first time. The result would be a closely fought, all-action contest that would lead to three more meetings between the two cruiserweights for years to come. Don't miss the kick off to the Huck vs. Afolabi rivalry for the WBO Cruiserweight World Title on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Ola Afolabi II
programme.desc: In this edition of World Class Championship Boxing, the WBO Cruiserweight World Championship is on the line when Germany's Marco Huck and Britain's Ola Afolabi meet for the second time in their memorable rivalry. Huck is coming off a majority decision defeat to Alexander Povetkin three months earlier, when he stepped up in weight to compete for the Heavyweight Title.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Matthew Macklin
programme.desc: This episode features an undisputed middleweight title fight between Sergio Martinez and Matthew Macklin, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Juan Manuel Marquez vs. Marco Antonio Barrera
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle of multiple-weight world champions, as Juan Manuel Marquez challenges Marco Antonio Barrera for the WBC super featherweight title.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Mitakeumi, Abi, Hakuho and Chiyotairyu from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Zagreb Grand Prix, where some of the young Judo fans get the opportunity to train with former Olympic champion Mark Huizinga and triple world champion Illias Iliadis. Plus we watch as Judo's biggest star Teddy Riner competes in the +100 kg division.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features a look at rising star Ryan "Darth" Bader. We go over BMX bike jumps with heavyweight Roy "Big Country" Nelson. And MMA:30 takes you inside the training camp of stud wrestler Phil Davis and we take a look at Bellator's duel promotional event Dynamite.

programme.title: WCCB Osleys Iglesias vs. Vladimir Shishkin
programme.desc: From the Montreal Casino in Canada, the undefeated IBO Super Middleweight Champion, Osleys Iglesias, looks to defend his title against top-ranked Vladimir Shishkin. The bout will also determine the mandatory challenger for the IBF World Championship in the division, currently held by Canelo Alvarez. Both fighters are ranked inside the top 5 according to several world rankings, with Iglesias ranked #3 and Shishkin #2 in the world by the IBF.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Bernard Hopkins vs. Jean Pascal
programme.desc: This episode features Bernard Hopkins taking on Jean Pascal in a light heavyweight title bout, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: Featuring Women's CMX Form and Weapons and Girl's Weapons at the ISKA US Open from Disney, Orlando, Florida, USA.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Sergio Martinez vs. Darren Barker
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a middleweight title fight between champion Sergio Martinez and up-and-coming European middleweight Darren Baker that ends with a right hook blast. Also on the card, action from 5-time champion Timothy Bradley.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.desc: Episode 11: Bangkok, Thailand - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Muay Thai and Martial Art of Punches, Kicks, Elbows and Knees with Masters Thakoon Pongsupha and Karim Pattana.

programme.desc: Episode 11: Bangkok, Thailand - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Muay Thai and Martial Art of Punches, Kicks, Elbows and Knees with Masters Thakoon Pongsupha and Karim Pattana.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA JP Buys vs. Luthando Biko
programme.desc: This episode features a Bantamweight championship bout as current champion JP Buys faces off against interm champion Luthando Biko. Bonus coverage includes Shaun De Lange vs. Marcel Teniers and Wade Kerspuy vs. Josemar Octavio.

programme.title: WCCB Sara Bailey vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: LIVE September 21st from the Hard Rock Casino in Ottawa, Canada, undefeated WBA Light Flyweight World Champion Sara Bailey of Ontario and IBF/WBO Light Flyweight World Champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina meet to unify the titles. Bailey claimed her title in just her fourth professional fight defeating Guadalupe Bautista, and Bermudez became a two-time champion when beating Tania Enriquez before two successful defenses.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israel's fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: Featuring Team Form and Weapons at the ISKA US Open from Disney, Orlando, Florida, USA.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Ryan Rhodes
programme.desc: The main event in this episode sees Saul (Canelo) Alvarez making his first defense of the WBC light middleweight title, taking on challenger Ryan Rhodes. The bout ends in the final round after a series of unanswered blows. Also on the card, action from former light heavyweight champ Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Hakuho, Goeido, Kakuryu and Takayasu from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: Highlights from the 26th Karate Senior World Championships as top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, all converged on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode follows former UFC welterweight champion Matt Serra around his hometown in New Jersey for a look at the lighter side of this intense competitor. Ring girl Natasha Wicks shows us that the fighters aren't the only ones with the big guns. Plus a behind the scenes look at the UFC Fan Expo and an interview with MMA legend Chael Sonnen.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 - EP 114
programme.desc: Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 - EP 107
programme.desc: Tim, Tommy, Tia and Grandma go on the search for treasure. // It's the Roar Festival, and Tim wants to have the best Roar in town. // Tim, Tommy and Tia find a lost mammoth in their house.

programme.desc: Tom and the riders discover the Ice Realm and find Buzzsaw inside.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 22

programme.desc: After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Tired of mean Mr. Krupp, the boys go back in time to prevent him from becoming a bully, but discover that their plan has backfired when they return to the present

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: In order to retrieve Mr. Krupp’s locked up rule book, George and Harold use an invention that ends up turning against them

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a coin purse with kitty coins, it's Store Day in the dollhouse! programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: When Gabby, Pandy and the Gabby Cats prepare for a sleepover in the Garden, they discover Pillow Cat has never been to a sleepover. They help her conquer her fears and enjoy her first sleepover.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes two little containers of popcorn and two movie tickets, it’s movie night in the dollhouse! Demanding Director CatRat leads the Gabby Cats through a Gabby-fied version of a classic story, Gabby-locks and the Three Bears.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: Pete the Polar Bear shows up for a vacation on MerCat’s sunny beach. Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats show Pete he can have a great vacation, even if things don’t go precisely to plan.

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 - EP 47
programme.desc: When the crew is forced to spend a night in the desert to avoid a sandstorm, they wake up the next day without their most important parts.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 43

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 44

programme.desc: Raa Raa is in a playful mood and sets off to find his friends. Together they incorporate everybody's game, to make one noisy, fun filled new game.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes pictures with silly filters, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 2

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 21

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 7

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 7
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his "big bad" year on the zodiac calendar - which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he "breaks up" with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S2 - EP 47
programme.desc: When a friend-matching quiz Poppy surreptitiously gives the Trolls reveals that Sky and Guy are a near perfect match, she sets out to make them friends! But, stalling for time, they expand each into a distinct, Trolls-y story.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 18

Gabby consoles him and tells him it’s even better - now, they have smash cake! They all hold up a piece and pose for a picture.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 19

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 16

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but she’s not getting any business. Now it’s up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 15

programme.desc: After fighting gets them stuck in a dangerous situation, enemies Skrap-It and Ton-Ton must join forces to save themselves.

programme.desc: Huzzah! Gabby the Bold and Pandy the Purr-owd are Knights in Training, and they head into the dollhouse for the Royal Knighting Ceremony. programme.desc: When Pixie struggles to recreate an old tradition perfectly, the kids realize they can make their own traditions./ A story told by Chef J inspires Juniper to go in search of snow.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lula’s pillow in time for the Tooth Fairy’s visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 20

It's up to the Knights in Training to solve the mystery and save King Catnip by performing acts of knighthood. For our Cat of the Day, Pandy makes a shield craft!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: Gabby receives a special nighttime delivery, unboxing a glow-in-the-dark train engine. However, she realizes that she's missing the other three train cars to complete the whole train. programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 72
programme.desc: A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 73
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tina’s new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 74
programme.desc: After Crispin Biscuits changes the Baby Love economy to reward companies for bringing in baby hate, Boss Baby is forced to make himself the most hated baby in town to save their startup company. Meanwhile, Tina needs to end Crispin Biscuits’ attacks on their company before she can finally hang up her boss role and retire to a life of cuddle time with daddy and mommy.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S11) - EP 16

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 1
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Money Movers - EP 2
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 1
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: Halftime Report - EP 2
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day

programme.title: The Exchange - EP 1
programme.desc: CNBC’s ‘The Exchange’ is the newsroom-based program for today’s investor. programme.title: Drama Serial Encore "Toto Nee-Chan: Fatherly Sister" Eps. 153
programme.desc: The 94th Drama Serial is about a girl Tsuneko who struggles to protect her mother and two sisters instead of her deceased father with following his lesson "How precious a normal life is." The lifestyle magazine published by Tsuneko becomes a must-read book for every woman living through the high economic growth period.

programme.title: Drama Serial "The Ghost Writer's Wife" Eps. 53 (R)
programme.desc: The 113th Drama Serial, inspired by the lives of Koizumi Setsu and Lafcadio Hearn also known as Koizumi Yakumo, portrays those who were left behind in the rapidly Westernizing Meiji era. At its heart is a woman captivated by ghost stories and her foreign-born husband. Together, they share a life that seems ordinary yet delightfully odd.

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: OMG, Your Honour - EP 2
programme.desc: Two distinguished criminal barristers, Fan Siu Yu and Yiu Lik Hung, have been rivals since law school. Despite being classmates, their personalities and approaches to law are very different, leading to years of personal and professional conflict.

programme.title: The QUEEN Of News 2 & What's On Today - EP 19
programme.desc: The story tells of anchorwoman Wen Huixin, who leaves SNK News Station and enters into a new competitive news industry landscape, forming a rivalry with Gu Zhaohua and Zhang Jiayan.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2697
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Gourmet Express
programme.desc: Hong Kong is home to gourmet food from all over the world. Our food anchors and hosts keep up with the latest foodie information and offers, gaining an in-depth understanding of the stories behind the taste.

programme.title: Court Lady - EP 13
programme.desc: Sheng Chumu, son of General Sheng Xiaojing, falls in love with Fu Rou, the daughter of an embroidery merchant. Having confirmed their feelings, the two return to Chang'an. Fu Rou soon becomes a female official, and Sheng Chumu is forced to join the army.

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies
programme.desc: This show brings on doctors and Chinese medicine practitioners to discuss diseases that the elderly should pay attention to, and provide prevention and treatment methods.

programme.title: News Treasury 2024
programme.desc: News Treasury takes everyone to uncover news from the treasure house. In addition to past specials, live broadcasts and reports, there are also precious clips from iconic events that have never been exposed.

programme.title: Prism Breaker - EP 25
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] The Tai Cho-fuk corruption case goes to trial with Lui Hok-sum as a tainted witness. Tai Cho-fuk scolds him for being ungrateful. programme.title: The Wanted Detective - EP 32
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] On his wedding day, Xiao Bei Ming (Wang Xing Yue), the best detective of Qi, was framed as a demon and fled into the lake on the charge of murdering his master and treason. Three years later, he returned and joins a group of witty partners to seek justice.

programme.title: No Room for Crime - EP 4
programme.desc: Ruthless takes Brother Sik and Kwok-yin to carry out some deal. They are under police watch before their arrest. Kwok-yin tells Brother Sik he is going to distract the police. Eventually, cat and mouse is played amid the hustle and bustle of the city. While on duty, Chi-hin catches sight of Ruthless. He also sees some familiar biker’s silhouette not so far away. He instinctively feels uneasy. At a mall, Ruthless is assaulted by a knife-wielding Thai assassin. Some biker also goes after him.

programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends.

programme.title: In Bed With A Stranger - EP 2
programme.desc: Chings-tin meets up with her son Yeung Chi-hin. But she realizes Chi-hin clearly has an emotional connection with Sin-mei. Ching-tin reviews her old diary. She finds out the schedule that was placed two days before her disappearance has been torn off, causing her to feel her disappearance was not so simple.

programme.title: Golden City (Ep 751-800) VVD Mandarin - EP 772
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Gods Of Honour - EP 16
programme.desc: NAR JAR (CHAN HO MAN, BENNY) was a ‘Fire master’ in his previous life. He was killed by LEE CHING (YUEN WAH). After reincarnation, he ironically becomes CHING’s third son. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager.

programme.title: Madam Cutie On Duty - EP 5
programme.desc: FA PING (Priscilla Wong), who was often made fun of by the others for being ugly during her childhood, underwent cosmetic surgery in the wake of an accident. Ever since then, she has been firmly convinced that an attractive appearance has a significant impact on one's life, and remains the same after joining the police.

programme.title: I've Got The Power - EP 1
programme.desc: Chung Hau-nin (Ruco Chan), Kiu Yeuk-lam (Natalie Tong) and Ko Yung (Joel Chan) are complete strangers. After surviving a traffic accident, they astonishingly gain mystical power!_x000D__x000D_Hau-nin and Ding Shuk-man (Moon Lau) are a loving young married couple. Hau-nin intends to use his mystical power for his own benefit, but he knows how to use his mystical power to help other people as he is influenced by Yeuk-lam, who has a righteous character.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The - EP 2
programme.desc: General LI (TONG, MICHAEL) of the Chor Kingdom and wizard CHAI (CHAN HO, MOSES) were colleagues under the same mentor. LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LI’s spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 10
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60’s in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era - EP 11
